general.title: Dating Lava Flows on Mauna Loa Volcano, Hawaiʻi (Audio Description)
general.description: In this video segment adapted from NOVA, scientists search for carbonized remains of plants preserved in lava flows to find out how long it has taken rain forests on Hawaiʻi to regenerate after a volcanic eruption.
